com.bham.bd.components.shooting

Class Bullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bham.bd.entity.BaseGameEntity
      • com.bham.bd.entity.MovingEntity
        • com.bham.bd.components.shooting.Bullet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultBullet, ExplosiveBullet, IceBullet, LaserGun, ThunderLaser

    public abstract class Bullet
extends MovingEntity
    Represents any bullet and defines common bullet properties

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bullet

        public Bullet(double x,
              double y,
              double speed,
              Point2D heading,
              BulletType type,
              Side side,
              double damage)

        Constructs a bullet using with geometrical properties to determine the position of a bullet on each frame. SIDE property is used to indicate which team the bullet can damage.

        Parameters:
        x - top left position in x axis
        y - top left position in y axis
        speed - velocity value at which the bullet will move
        heading - a normalized vector indicating the direction the bullet is moving
        type - bullet type (e.g., DEFAULT, EXPLOSIVE)
        side - ALLY or ENEMY side the bullet belongs to
        damage - amount of hp the bullet can take from an entity

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        public BulletType getType()
        Gets bullet's type
        Returns:
        DEFAULT, EXPLOSIVE or ICE type the bullet belongs to

      • setDamage

        Sets bullet's damage

        damage - amount of hp the bullet can take from an entity

      • handle

        public void handle(BaseGameEntity entity)
        Handles collision of one BaseGameEntity object

        This method hendles bullet's collision for 2 base game entities.

        • GameCharacter - for this object, the bullet simply deduces some hp based on its damage and is destroyed
        • Obstacle - for this object, if it has an attribute WALL, the bullet is destroyed and if it has an attribute BREAKABLE, the bullet deduces some health pints from it based on its damage
        Parameters:
        entity - a generic entity that is converted to appropriate child instance the bullet will handle

      • handle

        public void handle(List<BaseGameEntity> entities)
        Handles intersection of multiple BaseGameEntity objects
        Parameters:
        entities - a list of entities the bullet's collision will be checked on
        See Also:
        handle(BaseGameEntity)

      • destroy

        public abstract void destroy()
        Unregisters and prepares to remove the bullet. Also runs any destruction effects
